content: crochet yourself a very cute but very derpy psyduck amigurumi watch out when he gets a headache though because they are sure to psyche you out i made the design with psyduck s classic pose in which he clutches his head due to his major headaches he s part of my gotta crochet em all amigurumi series so be sure to check out all my other pokemon crochet patterns he s great to be paired up with my free pokeball crochet pattern 1 as well hope you enjoy being a pokemon trainer **level ** easy **size ** 4 in/10 cm tall **yarn ** worsted weight acrylic crochet thread - size 3 very small amount **need to know ** single_crochet in the round increase and decrease half_double_crochet slip_stitch you can also find the video tutorial for it on my youtube channel 2 i d love to see how your project turns out be sure to tag me on my instagram 3 or facebook 4 happy crocheting 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pikachu-and-pokeball-pod 2 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour 3 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 4 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan
